This free-to-attend exhibition will showcase the very latest technology for the designing, manufacturing and testing of spacecraft, satelite, launch vehicle and space-related technologies, bringing together engineers, systems integrators, contractors and suppliers in commercial, government and military space.

#spacetech

Find the latest manufacturing solutions at Europe`s meeting place for space technology & innovation

Event policies

By registering to attend and participating in any events organised by Smarter Shows you are consenting to the use and distribution of your likeness any photographs, video or audio to promote the event now and in the future. Our events are open to adults aged 18+. Any children aged 17 and under will not admitted to the Exhibition or Networking Events.
